title.text: Scenario forms for web information seeking and summarizing in bone marrow transplantation Introduction: User-centered scenario forms for retrieval and summarization

abstractContent.text: This paper presents the user-centered interface of a summarization system for physicians in Bone Marrow Transplan-tation (BMT).
It serves both retrieval and summarization, eliciting the query and presenting multi-document summaries in a situation-specific organization.
